# Government Tender Announcement

## **Tender Overview**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a Standing Offer (SO) Request for Suppliers (RFSO) for the provision of Thirteen (13) custom designed gun mounts for various platforms used by the general duty carbine, 300 Blackout, and the 40 mm launcher. The SO will be valid for a period of Five (5) years from the date of issuance.

## **Key Details**

*   Tender Reference Number: CB-804-57686821
*   Amendment Number: 10
*   Solicitation Number: 202402160
*   Publication Date: December 6th, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: February 9th, 2024 at 14:00:00 (ET)
*   Contracting Entity Name: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
*   Contracting Entity Address:
    •   73 Leikin Dr
    •   Mailstop 1
    •   Ottawa
    •   Ontario
    •   K1A0R2
    •   Canada
*   Contact Person: Marie-Eve Brunet
*   Contact Email: marie-eve.brunet@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
*   Contact Phone Number: 1 514 208-1137

## **Terms and Conditions**

*   Tenders must comply with the requirements specified in the solicitation and meet all mandatory technical criteria.
*   The responsive offer with the lowest individual evaluated unit price (IEUP) will be recommended for the issuance of a standing offer (1 standing offer only).
*   Tenders may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
*   Canada will make available notices of proposed procurement, solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
*   Suppliers must regularly consult the GETS for the most up-to-date information.
